name: packer-project
description: Node files that aid in development of Packer projects
author: Brian Zalewski <brian@megabyte.space> (https://megabyte.space)

scripts-info.commit: The preferred way of running git commit (instead of git commit, we prefer running 'npm run commit')
scripts-info.launch: Runs vagrant up to automatically spin up the VM
scripts-info.prepare-release: Updates the CHANGELOG with commits made using 'npm run commit'
scripts-info.test: Validates the Packer configuration file (i.e. template.json)
scripts-info.update: Runs .update.sh to automatically update meta files and documentation
scripts-info.version: Used by 'npm run prepare-release' to update the CHANGELOG
